text: amplify studio is a new visual
development environment in aws amplifi
that makes creating a full-stack web or
mobile app both a front-end ui and
back-end fast and easy instead of
writing front-end component code from
scratch you can quickly choose from
dozens of ui components for popular
features
these ui components are also available
within figma so your designer can create
and customize them and they can be
imported into studio as code
use the studio console to set up an app
back end and connect your ui components
to back-end data in clicks
studio offers a developer friendly
approach to low code it automatically
translates visual changes into clean
react code letting you focus on the
business logic and building a great app
experience
amplify studio makes it easy to get
started with our cloud expertise and
build full stack apps that are built to
scale following aws best practices get
to market faster and easier with amplify
studio
